name: stretch chokers for bottle cap necklaces
description: 15 Deep Pinkish/Purple Bottle Cap Necklace Chokers with washers. These are super soft and stretchy, fit right over your head, no clasp needed. One size fits most.  This are cut thick, and are great for resale, or craft shows. I have many other colors and styles available. Check out my other items! These work perfect with magnetic bottle cap charms.

name: Bracelet & anklet size chokers for Bottle Caps
description: 40 multicolored bracelet and/or anklet size chokers with washers.  These work perfect with magnetic bottle cap pendants. I will send a link to the address you have listed in pay pal with an instruction sheet in case you need help attaching the washer.  Don't worry, no sewing or gluing required.  My children love to make and sell these.

name: 10 large glue on jewelery bails
description:
10 Large glue on jewelry bails 

I make all kinds of necklaces,a nd I needed bails that would work with everything. Most of the items I bought to use, worked great with ball chain or some ribbon necklaces, but a lot of the ribbon necklaces I buy, the clasp is too large to fit through the bails. So I decided to start searching for larger ones.  Boy do they get expensive!!! I finally found them, and purchased a very large amount so I could pass on the savings.

I really feel in love with these, when I found out how great they worked on my braided bandanna necklaces!!! Those smaller bails never worked!!! Please check the image above with the tape measure, so you can see if this size will work great for you too!!

I use a small drop of E6000 glue, and attach to what ever pendant type I may be making....scrabble, wood, glass, you name it!!!

I carry lots of other supplies in my store! Check out my other items! I have everything you need for bottle cap necklaces :)

name: Blank Bottle Caps perfect for necklaces and hair bows
description: 25 blank bottle caps, ready for you to decorate! These are the same bottle caps I use for my magnetic bottle cap necklaces.
